headline: Is It Time To Reassess UnitedHealth Group (UNH) After A 37% Share Price Slide?
summary: If you are wondering whether UnitedHealth Group's share price now reflects good value or lingering risks, this article will help you weigh what the current market is really pricing in. The stock recently closed at US$284.20, with returns of a 1.4% decline over 7 days, a 19.2% decline over 30 days, a 15.5% decline year to date, and a 37.2% decline over the past year, which frames an important backdrop for any valuation discussion. Recent headlines around UnitedHealth Group have focused on...
